Key Match Events: The Houston Rockets defeated the Memphis Grizzlies 119-115 in a major road win.
Post-Match Reflections: The win gives the Rockets a little bit of breathing room as we near the halfway point of the regular season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Houston Rockets are becoming a legitimate force in the NBA after last night's win over the Memphis Grizzlies.
Others: The Rockets lead the season series over the Grizzlies 2-0, while being down to the Thunder in the season series by just one game (2-1).
